titleStmt.author: Howell, William, 1656-1714.
Church of England. Liturgies. Book of common prayer.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Leon. Lichfield, for John Howell,

notesStmt.note: Though often found bound with "The best companion", this is treated as a separate publication in "Books printed for John Howell bookseller in Oxford", bound at end, and in Wing.
With final advertisement leaf and vertical half-title, which reads: Common-prayer-book, Best companion, &c.
Identified as part of Wing H3132A on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1910.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
